entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:54 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
